altTitles.ja: ザ・ファブル

description.en:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

altTitles.en: Now That We Draw

description.en:
Uehara-kun loves 2-dimensional characters and his desire is to become a manga artist! However, his dreams are dashed when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript and starts a pseudo-romance with him that's a little too close to comfort, to help him with his manga!

This is a mangakas ✖ adolescent love comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!

title.en: The World of That Otome Game is Tough for Us

altTitles.ja: あの乙女ゲーは俺たちに厳しい世界です

altTitles.ja-ro: Ano Otomegē wa Ore-tachi ni Kibishī Sekai desu
Ano Otomege wa Ore-tachi ni Kibishii Sekai desu

description.en: Leon was reincarnated in the world of an otome game that he was forced by his sister to conquer just before his death. He tried to live a peaceful life as a mob character, but he encountered a scene where a female student ignored the flow of the story and tried to become the main character. Leon ended up seizing Marie, a girl who had a similar atmosphere to his sister from his previous life, and succeeded in thwarting the scheme. It should have have been the right choice... but why was he feeling uneasy about it?
description.ru:
Леон переродился мобом в мире «отомэ-игры», невольное прохождение которой спихнула на него младшая сестра. Полный отчаяния в мире превосходства женщин, он тем не менее пытается вести спокойную жизнь, нигде не отсвечивая.

В то же время Мария, также переродившаяся в этом мире, строит планы по заполучению положения главной героини и созданию «обратного гарема» с принцем и другими парнями, влюбившихся в неё с первого взгляда, но…

Какая же судьба уготована Леону и Марии, кто сделали лишь один выбор, отличающийся от изначального?!
description.pt-br: Leon foi reencarnado no mundo de um Otome Game que sua irmã o forçou a jogar pouco antes de morrer. Ele tentou viver uma vida pacífica como um personagem secundário, mas acabou encontrando uma cena em que uma estudante feminina ignorou o curso da história e tentou se tornar a personagem principal. Leon acabou capturando Marie, uma garota que tinha uma atmosfera semelhante à de sua irmã de sua vida anterior, e teve sucesso em frustrar o esquema. Deveria ter sido a escolha certa... mas por que ele estava se sentindo inquieto com isso?

altTitles.en: While Doing It

description.en: Kang Sihwa was everyone's sun, always in the spotlight, and the people around Lee Eunseo were always jealous of her because of her special childhood friend Sihwa. One day, Sihwa, who had suddenly disappeared, returned a few years later. With the swaying of Eunseo’s heart and Sihwa’s unpredictable behavior. We have a special relationship, right? Don't you think so? But… I still want to ask. What are we both doing?
description.ko: 모두의 태양이자 주목받는 존재인 강시화, 그런 시화와 특별한 소꿉 친구 사이로 주변의 질투를 받던 이은서. 어느 날 홀연히 사라졌던 시화가 몇 년이 흘러 돌아왔다. 자꾸 흔들리는 은서의 마음과 도저히 짐작할 수 없는 시화의 행동. 우리는 특별한 사이잖아? 너도 그렇게 생각하지? 하지만… 묻고 싶어. 너랑 난 뭐하는 사이야?

title.en: Go Away, Let Me Be Cute First!

description.en: This is a series of short serialized manhua stories that focuses on cats' daily lives. It centers on interesting everyday life stories of a sweet naive cat called "Fu Gui" and an arrogant cat called "Fa Cai", as well as their sentimental owner Niu Hong Hong.

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia
Mairimashita! Iruma-kun Mafia AU

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...

description.en: Unexpected endings, mind-blowing stories, so-cute-you-could-die hotpot ingredients... You'll laugh everyday until you get abs!
description.zh: 反转的剧情，开脑洞的故事，超萌火锅食材花样作死，每天逗你笑出腹肌！

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?

altTitles.ja: 私たちは元女子です

altTitles.en: We are Former Girls

description.en:
Rinko Mino, a first-year high school student, is a female manager of the volleyball club. She fell in love with her senior Yuki in the same club, worked hard at club activities, and she had a normal and enjoyable life. 

When she woke up one morning... She was a boy!? What will happen to the youth of Rinko, a girl who suddenly became the opposite sex!!?
description.es:
Rinko Mino, una estudiante de primer año de instituto, es la mánager femenina del club de voleibol.

Se enamora de Yuki, un estudiante de último curso del mismo club, trabaja duro en las actividades del club y lleva una vida normal y feliz.

¡Pero una mañana se despierta y se da cuenta de que se ha convertido en un chico ......!

¿Qué pasará con la juventud de Rinko, una chica que de repente se ha convertido en el sexo opuesto?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三野凛子は、バレーボール部の女子マネージャー。

同じ部の先輩・結城に恋をしたり、部活を頑張ったり、普通で楽しい毎日を送っていた。

そんなある日の朝目覚めると……男子になっていた!?

突然異性化しちゃった女子・凛子の青春は、どーなっちゃうのか!!?
description.es-la:
Rinko Mino, una estudiante de primer año de instituto, es la mánager femenina del club de voleibol.

Se enamora de Yuki, un estudiante de último curso del mismo club, trabaja duro en las actividades del club y lleva una vida normal y feliz.

¡Pero una mañana se despierta y se da cuenta de que se ha convertido en un chico ......!

¿Qué pasará con la juventud de Rinko, una chica que de repente se ha convertido en el sexo opuesto?
description.pt-br:
Rinko Mino, uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, é a gerente feminina do clube de vôlei. Ela se apaixonou por seu colega sênior Yuki no mesmo clube, trabalhou duro nas atividades do clube e teve uma vida normal e agradável.

**Quando ela acordou uma manhã... Ela era um garoto?!** O que acontecerá com a juventude de Rinko, uma menina que de repente se tornou do sexo oposto!!?

altTitles.en: The Top Couple Is a Bit Sweet

description.en: Song Yan and Wen Li are a well-known contract couple in the entertainment industry. Ever since they are married, they are not in business and have not been tied together. Countless fans lament,  yet many ship them together. That is until the two of them officially announced their participation in a national-level variety show for couples and they reluctantly began to come back to their career. During the recording process of the variety show, the two of them slowly discovered that their bond had already been firmly tied several years ago......

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

title.en: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)
Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.en: Fighting With an FPS Beginner

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Universe Mission!!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ:ユニバースミッション!!

description.en:
Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Universe Mission is a spin-off manga and the sequel to Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission!.  
  
The plot involves the mysterious Fu, who after kidnapping Future Trunks, lures Goku and Vegeta to the Prison Planet, an experimental area which Fu created and has filled with strong warriors from different planets and eras in order to force them into a game where they must collect the seven Dragon Balls if they wish to escape.

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title.en: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain

altTitles.ja: 父親が美少女になってしまって色々つらい

altTitles.ja-ro: Chichioya ga Bishoujo ni Natte Shimatte Iroiro Tsurai

altTitles.en: My Father Turned into a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Trouble.

altTitles.ru: Мой отец превратился в красивую девушку и это доставляет много хлопот.

description.en: A successful but annoying dad got gender-swapped and become a beautiful girl. Now he has lost his job and has to depend on his son while slowly starting anew.
description.ru:
Однажды в комнату Тацуи заходит красивая девушка... и, к его удивлению оказывается его отцом, который полностью изменился из-за шока от увольнения с работы! !
Хотя он и растерян перед своим отцом, потерявшим все (?), меняются ли мало-помалу отношения между родителем и ребенком, которые раньше были далекими? ? ?
Отец Тацуи потерял все. Тацуя с недоумением смотрит на отца, но расстояние между отцом и сыном постепенно сокращается...?
Отец – это мать, а сын – это отец? Нет, мой лучший друг — мой отец, а мой отец — мой лучший друг...?
Новая комедия TS, которая, несмотря на то, что в социальных сетях ее называют "физиологически невозможной", на самом деле является удивительной историей отца и сына, которая согреет ваше сердце!!!

altTitles.ja: ぎゅぎゅっと高橋

description.en:
Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!

altTitles.ja: マイホームヒーロー

description.en: For the sake of his family, an average middle-aged man must go against a crime syndicate, by all means necessary.
description.ja: 頼れる妻と、ちょっと反抗期気味だけど可愛い高校生の娘。鳥栖哲雄の人生はそれなりに幸せだった。娘の顔に殴打の傷を見つけるまでは。
description.pt: Pelo bem de sua filha, um homem de meia idade embarca na jornada de sua vida.
description.tr: Orta yaşlarında bir baba kızı ve ailesi uğruna her şeyi yapmaya hazır; suç karteline karşı koymak da buna dâhildir!
description.pt-br: Pelo bem de sua filha, Tetsuo de 47 anos embarca de uma vez em algo irremediável.

altTitles.ja: 北の砦にて

altTitles.ja-ro: At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

title.en: I'm an OTAKU but I want to fall in love with a gal

altTitles.ja: オタクくんとギャルが恋をする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun to Gyaru ga Koi wo Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of an Otaku and a Gyaru Falling in Love

altTitles.ru: История о том, как отаку и гяру влюбляются друг в друга

altTitles.es-la: Una historia sobre un otaku y una gal que se enamoran

altTitles.uk: Історія про те, як Отаку та Гяру закохуються

altTitles.zh: 死宅君与辣妹相恋的故事

altTitles.ja: オタクだってギャルと恋したい

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku Datte Gal to Koi Shitai

altTitles.ru: Даже отаку хочет влюбиться в гяру

description.en: Affection Level of each Gyarus for a single Otaku. Who will our otaku-kun chose as his girl?
description.es-la: El nivel de afecto de cada Gyarus por un único otaku. ¿A quién elegirá nuestro otaku-kun como su chica?

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

altTitles.en: A Certain Dark Side's ITEM

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

altTitles.ja: 愛重くんは病んでいる。

description.en: One day, Ichigotani Nanako receives a sudden confession from Agasa Yuki, the genius prince at school who's also her junior in her club. Surprised by this, the natural airhead Nanako blurts out, "I''ll be in trouble if you die though!" and ends up dating Agasa-kun. Anyway, Agasa-kun has an extraordinary obsession and possessiveness, and he has no mercy for any bugs that come near Nanako!
description.ja: ある日突然、部活の後輩で学校一の秀才プリンスである愛重由希に告白された苺谷奈々子。いきなりの告白に驚きながらも、天然な奈々子は「死なれたら困る！」と愛重くんと付き合うことに。とにかく愛が重い愛重くんは、執着の仕方も独占欲も異常で、奈々子に近づく悪い虫には容赦なし!!

description.en: A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei Shite

altTitles.ja: 物語の黒幕に転生して
物語の黒幕に転生して～進化する魔剣とゲーム知識ですべてをねじ伏せる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei shite: Shinka Suru Maken to Game Chishiki de Subete o Nejifuseru

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story
Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story: Overwhelm Everything With the Ever-Evolving Demon Sword and Game Knowledge

description.en:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message “Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose “Yes” without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)
description.pt-br:
Havia um jogo globalmente popular chamado “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”.
Ren finalizou a sequência desse jogo com o recorde mais rápido do mundo e, assim, obteve um bônus especial de dados.
No entanto, não importa onde ele olhou dentro do jogo, ele não conseguiu encontrar os dados.
No momento em que Ren estava prestes a desistir da busca, ele decidiu começar a jogar a segunda rodada do jogo.
De repente, uma mensagem de notificação “Deseja iniciar uma história especial?” aparece na tela.
Quando Ren escolhe “Sim” sem hesitar, ele perde a consciência e, quando acorda, era um bebê. —-
Será que ele reencarnou como um dos heróis em “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”?
Ren, que pensava que tal coisa era impossível, não podia acreditar em seus ouvidos quando ouviu seu nome da boca de sua mãe.
Era o nome de um colega de classe que trai os heróis no meio da história.
Claro, ele deseja viver em paz.
Mas no jogo, ele conhece uma santa cuja vida ele deveria tirar, e não o faz.
Além disso, ele acaba salvando um personagem (o chefe de uma grande família nobre) que deveria morrer.
Todas essas coisas criam um desenvolvimento que ele não sabe jogar…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)

title.en: Yuuryou Bukken Mou Dame Sou - Furo, Toilet to Tenshi wa Kyoudou desu

altTitles.ja: 優良物件もうダメ荘~風呂､トイレと天使は共同です~

altTitles.en: Excellent Property: This Dormitory Is Full of Losers  ~Communal Toilets and Angels~

description.en: A story about a 70-year-old super cheap apartment named "Damesou" near the coast of a rural village with a communal bathroom, washstand, kitchen, and toilets, and the losers taking residence here!

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife
I Found a Female Knight in a Rice Field, in the Countryside They Think She’s My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

A slow life in the countryside begins with a beautiful female knight!

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10528/episode/349125) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

altTitles.ja: ちょいあ!

description.en: 4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

altTitles.en: Nezumi's First Love

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

altTitles.ja: 最果てに惑う

altTitles.en: Lost at the Farthest Ends

description.en: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
description.ru:
«Семь лет назад я убил человека».

Расправившись с преступником, который довёл его сестру, Юри, до самоубийства, Кадзума был приговорён к семи годам тюремного заключения. Даже после выхода на свободу его преследуют мысли о совершённом убийстве и о девочке, наблюдавшей за происходящим. Терзаемый чувством вины, Кадзума принимает решение искупить свои грехи собственной смертью. Вместе со своей матерью он навещает могилу Юри, где замечает знакомое лицо девочки...

Это история о несчастной судьбе дочери преступника-потерпевшего.

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

altTitles.en: Demon Queen–sama Can't Defeat Hero-kun.
The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

title.en: I Raised My Fiancé with Money

altTitles.en: I Raised My Fiancé With Money
RMFWM

description.en: Overflowing wealth, exceptional looks. Ilya Bloden's life was perfect.Until she witnessed her fiancé's affair, that is."I changed everything, my taste, my hobbies, I accommodated his every wish… But I won't live like a pushover any longer. I'll get a perfect break up!"For the perfect break up, she finds a new fiancé, Karhan Evantheon. She tried to shield herself with Karhan's fearsome reputation, but…"I found this flower on the battlefield, and I really wanted Illya to see it."Turns out, he was a cute puppy?! Will this engagement be okay?

title.en: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant

altTitles.en: I Grabbed the Tyrant's Heart
I Captured the Tyrant's Heart

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 遭難サイコ

title.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Too Kind!!

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘は優しすぎる!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!

altTitles.pt-br: A filha do Rei Demônio é muito gentil!!

description.en: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this…?
description.pt-br: O Rei Demônio mais forte, Ahriman, controla cada parte do mundo. Mas, ele precisou parar de conquistar inesperadamente. Qual será a razão inesperada…?

description.en: Coquettish Lawyer x Tsundere Detective! Officer Shen, the human-lie-detector detective, finds it difficult to resist the smooth-talking lawyer, his nemesis who spits out lies like flowing electric current. "You used to be my closest friend, yet you ruined my reputation. Now you actually dare to come back and lick me?!” The elite police officer, after demoted to the Useless Department, meets his Mr. Liar again. Can the past misunderstandings between them be resolved? Can they go back to how they were in the past?

‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

altTitles.ja: ふだじょ！～乙女召喚脱衣大戦～

altTitles.zh-hk: 卡片少女召唤脱衣大战
召唤卡片少女脱衣大战

altTitles.en: Card Girl!: Maiden Summoning Undressing Wars

description.en: A world where cute girls become cards and fight. And it's terrifying (happy?). In other words, you have to get the other girl to take off her clothes. Use the girls, who materialize from the cards, and their intelligence and strength to win! If you win, the other girl card is yours! A harem is not a dream.

Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs, but joins the Royal Guard of Futura. Through many harsh battles and emotional moments, he will persist to make Futura into a better nation!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)


♥ Animated Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf
♥ Support: on patreon, if I open it again!

altTitles.pt-br: Lábios no limiar de uma faca

altTitles.en: Lips on the Tip of a Knife

description.en:
Arune is known as the crazy dog of the kingdom and the best knight of all time. Upon her parents' incessant pestering, she ends up getting married.

"If you're not fond of your husband, you may kill him and return."

But, no one told her that her husband was this handsome.

"I'm nervous that you might crack because you're just like glass."

On top of that, her husband treats her like a fragile pottery. Arune, who’s not weak at all, and the nervous, yet obsessive husband, Kassian. A precarious romance where misunderstandings collide one after another.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=920927), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5529880)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8926246), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800778)
description.ko:
제국의 미친개, 역대 최강의 기사 아르네.
그녀는 부모님의 성화에 어쩔 수 없이 결혼을 하게 된다.
"남편이 맘에 안 들면 죽이고 돌아와야지."
하지만 누구도 남편이 이렇게 잘생겼다고 말 안 해줬잖아?
“당신이 유리 같아서 깨질까 봐 불안해.”
게다가 남편이 나를 연약한 도자기처럼 대하는데?
전혀 약하지 않은 아르네와, 전전긍긍 집착남편 카시안.
오해와 오해가 겹치는 아슬아슬 착각 로맨스!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=920927), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5529880)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8926246), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800778)
description.uk:
Скажений пес імперії – Арне, найсильніша лицарка усіх часів. За наказом матері вона змушена вийти заміж. 
«Якщо тобі не подобається твій чоловік, то розлучись і повертайся». 
Але чому ніхто не сказав мені, що він гарний? 
Він виглядає як скло, і я боюся, що він розіб’ється у моїх руках.
А чоловік в свою чергу ставиться до мене, як до крихкої порцеляни. 
Арне, яка зовсім не слабка, її одержимий чоловік Кассіан, їхній трохи неправильно зрозумілий роман, і тонна непорозумінь!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=920927), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5529880)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8926246), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800778)
description.pt-br:
O cão louco do Império, Arne, a cavaleira mais forte de todas.

Ela é forçada a casar sob as ordens de seus pais.

“Se não gostar do seu marido, mate-o e retorne.”

Mas ninguém me disse que meu marido é tão lindo?

“Você é como vidro, então tenho medo de te quebrar.”

Além disso, meu marido me trata como uma porcelana frágil.

Arne, que não é nem um pouco fraca, e seu marido obcecado Cassian.

Um romance estreitamente ilusório onde mal-entendidos se sobrepõem!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=920927), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5529880)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8926246), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=800778)

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.en: Survive As The Hero’s Husband!

altTitles.vi: Chàng Rể Mạnh Nhất Lịch Sử

description.en:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai
My Senpai Is Annoying

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara que ela estava interessada não era um cara

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es: "Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".    De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
